original_text: And now the Lord has brought it about; he has done just as he said he would. All this happened because you people sinned against the Lord and did not obey him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그가 말씀하신 대로 행하셨으니 이는 너희가 여호와께 범죄하고 그의 목소리에 순종하지 아니하였으므로 이제 이루어졌도다 이 일이 너희에게 임한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And now the Lord has brought it about
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 주께서 이 모든 것을 이루셨다

sentences.original_text: he has done just as he said he would
All this happened because you people sinned
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일이 일어난 것은 너희 백성이 죄를 지었기 때문이다
